AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gnome Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a community of gnomes. Like all gnome children, [PAWN_pronoun] had a deep magical power. Even now, [PAWN_pronoun] is attuned to all living things.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gnome Chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] practiced the art of gnome cooking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Glider Pilot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] flew gnome gliders all across the land. [PAWN_pronoun] had many adventures along the way.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gnome Soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the gnome army. [PAWN_pronoun] defended the gnome homeland from many foes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gnome Noble
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was among the highest in the social hierarchy of the gnomes.[PAWN_pronoun] never had to do manual labor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Frogsnatcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of gathering the frogs in the gnome stronghold's ponds.[PAWN_pronoun] acquired a deep respect for the amphibians during this time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gnome Crafter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] owned a small clothing store, where [PAWN_pronoun] made [PAWN_possessive] own clothes for sale.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ambassador
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as an ambassador from the gnome stronghold to many foreign lands. This gave [PAWN_pronoun] a knowledge of other lands that most gnomes lack.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gnome Engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] developed new machines to serve the gnome people.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sage
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a gnome sage, possessed of powerful magic connected to the world's life force
